task_description:
# Add form validation to Create Project dialog

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-6](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-6/add-form-validation-to-create-project-dialog)
**Priority:** Urgent
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

**Bug Description:**
The Create Project form has no validation. Users can submit empty forms or invalid data.

**Location:** frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx

**Issues:**

* No minimum length check for project name
* No format validation for project code
* End date can be before start date
* No error messages shown to user
* Submit button is always enabled

**Expected Behavior:**

* Validate required fields (name, code)
* Validate date logic (end >= start)
* Show inline error messages
* Disable submit until valid

**Priority:** High
